title: Unemployed persons worldwide until 2020
summary: In general Unemployed persons in millions has fallen over the Year.
Unemployed persons in millions is roughly constant from 2013 to 2016, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Unemployed persons in millions, about 201.3 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Unemployed persons in millions about 174.1 was reached at Year 2017
